author: mschaich
post_text: February 17, 2015 at 10:29 AM#1I'd like to assign a playbackfilter to pool playback sequence.Line1: assign seq 1 thru 10 world (1st row world)Line2: assign seq 11 thru 20 world (2nd row world)Line3: assign seq 21 thru 30 world (3rd row worl)but it isnt working. why?greets

posts.author: mschaich
posts.post_text: February 17, 2015 at 10:29 AM#1I'd like to assign a playbackfilter to pool playback sequence.Line1: assign seq 1 thru 10 world (1st row world)Line2: assign seq 11 thru 20 world (2nd row world)Line3: assign seq 21 thru 30 world (3rd row worl)but it isnt working. why?greets

posts.author: Duplicate MarkvanderMeulen
posts.post_text: February 17, 2015 at 12:31 PM#2That's pretty easy: the command you are using is not correct :pTry this:Assign world/filter X at sequence YOr to use it on executors:Assign world/filter X at executor Y.ZX,Y,Z are the numbers you need to fill in for world/filter number and executor/sequence number

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: February 17, 2015 at 1:38 PM#3be aware the difference of assigning worlds to sequences versus executors:assigning worlds to executors, will create an output filter (playback-filter)assigning worlds to sequences, will create an input filter (store-filter)

posts.author: mschaich
posts.post_text: February 17, 2015 at 1:44 PM#4assign filter x at sequence ynothing happens.assign world x at sequence yset a input filter.But id like to have a playback filter.greets

posts.author: mschaich
posts.post_text: February 17, 2015 at 1:46 PM#5"be aware the difference of assigning worlds to sequences versus executors:assigning worlds to executors, will create an output filter (playback-filter)assigning worlds to sequences, will create an input filter (store-filter)"But in the assignmenu is a possibilty for playbackfilter. Did you know the right command, to get a playbackfilter in sequences?greetings

posts.author: Duplicate MarkvanderMeulen
posts.post_text: February 17, 2015 at 2:10 PM#6You have to define the filters in the first place before you can assign them (filter pool) I guess playbackfilters can only be applied to executors

title: How to assign Playbackfilter Pool Playback Sequence per macro
